alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Wakulla, Gadsden, northern Liberty and Leon Counties in Big Bend of Florida, southeastern Grady County in southwestern Georgia and southwestern Thomas Counties in south central Georgia through 545 PM EDT/445 PM CDT/... At 515 PM EDT/415 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles east of Lynn Haven to near Florida A and M. Movement was north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florida State University, Quincy, Tallahassee Comm College, Tallahassee, Havana, Blountstown, Midway, Florida A and M, Woodville, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Gretna, Bristol, Altha, Lake Bradford, Rock Bluff, Clarksville, Florence, Quincy Airport and Lowry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
